scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a divine figure, likely God the Father, seated and holding the crucified Christ. The figure wears a papal tiara and ornate robes, suggesting a representation of divine authority. In his left hand, he holds a globe surmounted by a cross, symbolizing dominion over the world. The scene is framed by an arched border decorated with foliage and floral motifs. Below the figure, a coat of arms is displayed, featuring a shield with heraldic symbols and elaborate scrollwork. The background is filled with a starry or radiant effect, indicating a celestial or divine setting.
